# userInterfaceLayoutDirection

**Instance Property**

The user interface layout direction.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var userInterfaceLayoutDirection: NSUserInterfaceLayoutDirection { get set }
```

## Discussion

When set to [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSUserInterfaceLayoutDirection/rightToLeft], the outline view displays the disclosure triangle to the right of the cell instead of the left. The default value is [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSUserInterfaceLayoutDirection/leftToRight].
title: userInterfaceLayoutDirection
